resources.string: Welcome to the Mental Calculation app!\nDo you think you are good on calculating without use calculator?\nOK, let\'s see what you can do!!

This is an android app developed by OUSSAMA CHATRI.

This app gives you a question on calculating to test and up your skills on Mental Calculating!

It gives you the choice to choose an operating like addition, multiplication,...etc or mix them!

1)Don't use calculatrice.

2)Choose the answer on just 10 sec.

3)Don't cheat!
